entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 p.m. MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow at times heavy along the foothills this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
